channel.title: EMCWorld2011 on Scott's Weblog
channel.description: Recent content in EMCWorld2011 on Scott's Weblog

item.title: Have You Registered Yet?
item.description: This is a very short blog post. In fact, it’s probably less of a blog post and more of just a question: Have you registered for Spousetivities at EMC World 2011 yet? If you haven’t yet, I encourage you to surf over to the registration page and sign up now! For more information on some of the planned activities, have a look at Crystal’s Spousetivities post here.

item.title: Spousetivities at EMC World 2011
item.description: Heading to EMC World 2011 in Las Vegas in May? Cool, I’ll probably see you there. What’s even cooler, though, is the fact that my wife, Crystal (@crystal_lowe on Twitter) will be, for the first time, organizing spouse activities for EMC World! If you’re a regular reader of my site you know that Crystal first launched spouse activities at VMworld 2008 in Las Vegas, and since that time her spouse activities—now known as “Spousetivities”–have become enormously popular.
